_comment: 5-item emotional exhaustion measure, adapted from one of the subscales of the Maslach Burnout inventory (Maslach and Jackson, 1986), data of British sample from the German HWC validation paper
datasetApaCitation: Paruzel, A., Abendroth, A., Mayer, A., Xie, J. L., & Maier, G. W. (2022). The german version of the Hybrid Work Characteristics Scale.Psychological Test Adaptation and Development, 3(1), 116–124. https://doi.org/10.1027/2698-1866/a000025

instruments.instrumentApaReference: Xie, J. L., Elangovan, A. R., Hu, J., & Hrabluik, C. (2019). Charting new terrain in work design: A study of hybrid work characteristics. Applied Psychology: An International Review, 68(3), 479–512. 10.1111/apps.12169

items.itemStemText: I feel emotionally drained from my work
I feel used up at the end of the workday
I feel fatigued when I get up in the morning and have to face another day on the job
Working with people all day is really a strain for me
I feel burned out from my work
I feel frustrated by my job
I feel I’m working too hard on my job
Working with people directly puts too much stress on me
I feel like I’m at the end of my rope
